newsitem.title: EU: EP RULES OF PROCEDURE COMMITTEE AGENDA - DEC 16-17.
newsitem.headline: EP RULES OF PROCEDURE COMMITTEE AGENDA - DEC 16-17.

text.p: Committee on the Rules of Procedure, the Verification of Credentials and Immunities [[ Monday 16 December 1996 ]] 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE220.612 ) 2. Approval of minutes of meetings of: - 30 and 31 October 1996 (PE219.673 ) - 11 November 1996 (PE220.203 ) 2.1 VERIFICATION OF CREDENTIALS 3. Verification of credentials (DVR0368 ) - Mrs Pasqualina NAPOLETANO (PE220.205 ) - the Austrian Members (PE220.206 ) - the Finnish Members (PE220.207 ) 3.1 INTERPRETATION 4. Rule 123(5): objections concerning the vote on Mrs Riis-Jorgensen's report (T05321) REG0105 REG0105 + REGL Fond - Exchange of views 5. Rule 92(2) - tabling of oral amendments to recommendations not available in all languages (T04875) REG0071 + REGL Fond DONNELLY Brendan P. (PPE) - Consideration of working document 6. Rule 150 - Interpretation of Rule 124(6) on oral amendments tabled in commit tee (T04919) REG0073 + REGL Fond GUTIERREZ DIAZ A. (GUE) - Initial exchange of views 7. Rule 136: temporary committees of inquiry; attendance by members and present ation of the final report (T05320) REG0104 REG0104 + REGL Fond NORDMANN Jean-Thomas (ELD) (PE219.666 ) - Initial exchange of views Possibly initial exchange of views 8. Rule 141: membership of subcommittees (T04926) REG0074 + REGL Fond DELL'ALBA Gianfranco (ARE) (PE220.209 ) - Consideration Consideration and possibly adoption of a draft letter 8.1 AMENDMENT 9. Rule 154: report for the Council of Europe (T05317) REG0101 REG0101 B4-0717/96 B4-0717/96 + REGL Fond DELL'ALBA Gianfranco (ARE) - Initial exchange of views (B4-0717/96 ) 10. Assistants: regulations and duties (T04835) REG0067 + REGL Fond R JANSSEN van R. (PPE) - Exchange of views Possibly exchange of views 11. Rule 116 (split voting) (T04196) REG0060 + REGL Fond R DONNELLY Brendan P. (PPE) - Exchange of views Further exchange of views 12. Financing and operation of the intergroups (T04836) REG0068 + REGL Fond R SPIERS Shaun M. (PSE) - Consideration of working document 13. Rule 48: Written declarations (T05319) REG0103 REG0103 B4-1092/96 B4-1092/96 + REGL Fond (ARE) - Appointment of rapporteur (B4-1092/96 ) 14. Rule 156: right of petition (T05318) REG0102 REG0102 B4-1091/96 B4-1091/96 + REGL Fond WIBE Soren. (PSE) - Initial exchange of views (B4-1091/96 ) 15. Simplification of procedures for the presentation of annual reports to Parl iament (T04623) INI0479 INI0479 + REGL Fond CROWLEY Brian. (UPE) - Exchange of views 16. Rule 147 - Cooperation between committees responsible and asked for an opin ion (T05314) INI0900 + REGL Fond - Appointment of rapporteur 17. Calendar of activities for 1997 - Exchange of views 18. Date of next meeting (PE/XVIII/OJ/97-01 ) - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
